Flying, lifelink
Whenever Archdemon Griselbrand deals combat damage to a player, if you have fewer than seven cards in hand, draw cards equal to the difference.
Whenever you cast a spell, torment each opponent. [i](They lose 3 life unless they discard a card or sacrifice a nonland permanent.)[/i]
Pay 7 life: Add {B}{B}{B}{B}{B}{B}{B}.
